description.en: Unexcavated military barracks reworked from private houses in Block E6 at Dura-Europos.

properties.description: Total station data collected in 2008 by Jennifer Baird, Ben Gourley, Simon James, and Dan Stewart, funded by the Leverhulme Trust and the Society for the Promotion of Roman Studies.
properties.title: Total Station and Photogrammetric Location of E6 Barracks
